name: Suspicious Shrimp Bisque
desc: A thick, orange-red soup. A single mouthful makes your face burn hot in an instant, giving even the redness of the cooked shrimp a run for its money. After coughing and gagging for a few minutes, you finally manage to breathe again, but by then, you no longer feel like giving the dish another try...

value.text: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
